titles: The royal common-wealth's man, or King David's picture represented in a sermon preached at the solemnity of the funeral of Sir Tho. Adams, knight and baronet, and alderman of London ; in St. Katherine Creechurch, on the 10th of March, 1667 / by Nath. Hardy ...
author: Hardy, Nathaniel, 1618-1670.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Newcomb, for William Grantham ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
